alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 1:51AM MST until February 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another weather system is expected early Tuesday, lasting into Wednesday and will bring greater snow amounts than this first system. Snow forecast from 8 PM Today to 11 PM Monday: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 6 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 2 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
